  1. PAULDING COUNTY NEWS
             Stay up to date with the latest news

  1. Notice of Board of Commissioners Special Called Meeting

    The Paulding County Board of Commissioners will hold a Special Called Board of Commissioners Meeting on Friday, April 12, 2019 at 9:00 AM at the Watson Government Complex Administration Building, 240 Constitution Blvd., Dallas GA 30132. Read on...

  2. Notice of Closing for Good Friday

    All Paulding County Government offices will be closed Friday, April 19, 2019, in observance of Good Friday. Offices will re-open Monday, April 22, 2019, at 8:00 a.m.

  3. Notice of Town Hall Meeting for Commissioner Chuck Hart

    Commissioner Chuck Hart will hold a Town Hall Meeting on April 18, 2019 from 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm at Taylor Farm Park 1380 Pine Valley Road Powder Springs, GA 30127 Read on...

  4. Chairman’s Corner

    The Chairman’s Corner keeps citizens connected and allows an opportunity to learn about the things going on and around our great county. Additional info...

  1. Rides for Wishes

    The 2nd Annual Rides for Wishes will be on September 14th, 2019. Registration will be opening soon. Check back often as updates become available. Additional Info...

  2. Richland Creek Reservoir

    The Richland Creek Reservoir (RCR) is part of the Richland Creek Reservoir Water Supply Program. Read on...
